a. space 2 over 8 plus 3 over 8 equals fraction numerator 2 plus 3 over denominator 8 end fraction equals 5 over 8
b. space 8 over 7 minus 5 over 7 equals fraction numerator 8 minus 5 over denominator 7 end fraction equals 3 over 7
c. space 2 over 3 plus 3 over 5 equals fraction numerator left parenthesis 2 x 5 right parenthesis plus left parenthesis 3 x 3 right parenthesis over denominator 3 x 5 end fraction equals fraction numerator 10 plus 9 over denominator 15 end fraction equals 19 over 15
d. space 2 1 fifth minus 1 3 over 7 equals 11 over 5 minus 10 over 7 equals fraction numerator 77 minus 50 over denominator 35 end fraction equals 27 over 35
